title: Why did some nomadic tribes, barbarian tribes always kill people and sack settlements? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why did some nomadic tribes, barbarian tribes always kill people and sack settlements? OK, so let’s use a bit of really simplistic common sense. If you’re going around raiding, you probably are going to use up the resources in an area and you’ll not be well received as neighbors by the remaining people, so it’d be a good idea to move on. Is that really something that needs to be explained?
